channel.title: 3D on 🍋 Lemon Zest
channel.description: Recent content in 3D on 🍋 Lemon Zest

item.title: [Paper] Mesh R-CNN
item.description: ️️️Mesh R-CNN ⭐️️️️️️️️⭐️️️️️⭐️ | arXiv This new paper generates consistent and high-fidelity 3D shapes from 2D images. This is a large improvement on previous methods that used iterative shape deformation. They proceed as follow: Use a usual R-CNN to produce a bounding box and 2D mask. Implement a new branch to cubify the image. Generate a cubed mesh. Align mesh with image. Refine voxel to mesh several times.
